TypeTeamMember.biography: Jordan is Chief Marketing Officer at TripleLift. As CMO, he leads marketing strategy to drive growth. Prior to joining TripleLift, Jordan was Chief Marketing Officer of The Weather Channel (B2C) and The Weather Company (B2B), both part of IBM. While there, he oversaw the launch of a new ad industry-facing brand named “Watson Advertising.” Jordan is a 25-year veteran of the advertising industry and has spent the majority of his career at leading advertising agencies like Digitas and Mindshare. He is responsible for creating the industry’s NewFronts and for launching the first-ever live streamed concert series.
